title: Vision. [No. 35]
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, SA Films, Audio Productions and Guggenheim Productions
brief_description: Cinemagazine: Annual Folk Crafts Fair at Harper’s Ferry, West Virginia; the blending of horse and rider makes up the sport of Dressage; Scientists study their own private forest to find better ways of timber control and growth; an impressionistic view of everybody’s favourite city, San Francisco; America celebrates the centennial of one of its greatest composers, Charles Ives Narrated by Michael Tolan.
